heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_kez
heroes.bio_loc: "I was born with a price on my head. As I got better at causing trouble, that price went up. Every time Queen Imperia raised the bounty, I knew I must have done something right. I think that's the worst part about being gone so long in Icewrack... I've got to get that price back up to a respectable number."
heroes.hype_loc: When it comes to strategy, Kez tends to wing it â€” he's able to swap on the fly between his katana and sai to slash, dash, swoop, and parry as the needs of the battlefield demand. But when he puts his mind to it, he can account for any eventuality, choosing the right tool to attack, escape or simply outwit his enemies with a little advance planning.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Flexible melee master with two sets of weapons and abilities

facets.description_loc: Kez deals extra damage on the first attack after switching to Katana, and gains bonus movement speed after switching to Sai.
facets.name: kez_flutter

facets.description_loc: Triggering a Shodo Sai Mark from invisibility deals bonus critical damage. Increases Raven's Veil invisibility duration.
facets.name: kez_shadowhawk

abilities.name: kez_echo_slash
abilities.desc_loc: Kez slashes forward in a line with his Katana, attacking enemies in an area and applying a brief slow. After a short delay, the area is attacked again. Heroes take bonus damage.
abilities.lore_loc: Kez and his master Kraw have worked tirelessly to train the Kazurai new ways to keep the flyers off balance by improving upon ancient techniques.

abilities.name: kez_grappling_claw
abilities.desc_loc: Kez swings on a grappling hook towards the target unit or tree.  When the grappling hook collides with the target, that unit has slowed movement speed. Upon reaching the enemy target, Kez lands an attack on them.
abilities.lore_loc: The Kazurai have the speed and reach to drag even the highest flyers from the skies.

abilities.name: kez_kazurai_katana
abilities.desc_loc:
Katana attacks and abilities apply a stacking damage over time to enemies that deals a percentage of the original attack's damage as additional damage over time.

Kez may activate the ability to impale the target with his attack, preventing them from moving or turning. The target's Katana debuff bursts, causing some of the stacks to deal damage instantly.
abilities.lore_loc: To fight back against the reach of Imperia and her Queensguard, the Kazurai had to become skilled in the ways of attrition.
abilities.shard_loc: Kez lifesteals %lifesteal_pct%%% from the impale. If the impale comes from behind the target, the target is stunned. Increases max burst stacks.

abilities.name: kez_switch_weapons
abilities.desc_loc:
Kez switches between his Kazurai Katana and Shodo Sai.

He gains different attack capabilities and abilities based on the weapon equipped. The abilities level up together, and when an ability is used, the associated alternate weapon ability also goes on cooldown.
abilities.lore_loc: As former followers of the Shodo, the leaders of the Kazurai Order can switch effortlessly between twin disciplines of martial mastery over sai and blade.
abilities.scepter_loc:
Casting a weapon ability that would set its alternate weapon ability on cooldown does not do so if it's the first one used within %scepter_cooldown_timer% seconds after casting Switch Discipline.

Casting any weapon ability refreshes the cooldown of Switch Discipline.
facets_loc: Kez deals extra damage on the first attack after switching to Katana, and gains bonus speed after switching to Sai.

abilities.name: kez_raptor_dance
abilities.desc_loc:
Kez enters into an uncontrollable state for %AbilityCastPoint% second, becoming invulnerable for %invuln_period%s and receiving a basic dispel, remaining immune to magic damage for the remainder of the cast time and the duration of the slashes.

If the cast completes successfully, Kez performs a series of deadly radial slashes around him that deal damage based on the max health of the target and heal Kez for a percentage of all damage dealt.
abilities.lore_loc: Unleash the inner fury of the Flightless to feast on the essence of your foes.
notes_loc: Slash Lifesteal is reduced to %illusion_lifesteal_pct%%% when slashing a creep or an illusion.

abilities.name: kez_falcon_rush
abilities.desc_loc: Kez gains the ability to rush towards enemy targets to deliver echoing secondary attacks.  While in this state, Kez has phased collision and slow resistance.
abilities.lore_loc: An ancient Shodo technique used to hunt faster aerial foes, stealing the advantage and delivering multiple attacks within a single flap of their prey's panicking wings.

abilities.name: kez_talon_toss
abilities.desc_loc: Kez throws a Sai at the target unit, applying a fixed damage attack and silence.
abilities.lore_loc: The Shodo learned to rely upon distance and disorientation to survive against much stronger opposition.
notes_loc: The fixed damage attack has True Strike.

abilities.name: kez_shodo_sai
abilities.desc_loc:
Kez's attacks and abilities with the Sai have a chance to Mark enemies. The next attack or ability damage from Kez will stun the enemy and deal a critical strike, consuming the buff.

Kez may activate the ability to disarm himself, lock his facing, and parry attacks and attack effects from the targeted direction for %parry_duration% seconds. If an attack is parried from an enemy Hero in this way, that Hero is stunned and gains a stronger Mark that stuns for longer and deals %parry_bonus_crit%%% * Target Hero Level bonus critical strike.

The sub-ability may be used to cancel the blocking early.
abilities.lore_loc: The Shodo may have lost their way, but Kez and the Kazurai can still use Shodo knowledge for the good of the people.

abilities.name: kez_ravens_veil
abilities.desc_loc: Kez releases a wave of smoke that applies his Mark to nearby enemies, briefly reducing their vision. Kez receives a basic dispel and gains bonus movement speed and invisibility until he attacks or casts a spell.
abilities.lore_loc: Eying either threat or opportunity, Shodo masters slip instantly into shadow to reset the terms of any engagement in their own favor.

abilities.name: kez_shadowhawk_passive
abilities.desc_loc: Triggering a Shodo Sai Mark from invisibility deals bonus critical damage. Increases Raven's Veil invisibility duration.
